mapper.insert: insert into tbl_recipereply(mno, bno, rno, seq, content) values (#{mno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bno, jdbcType=INTEGER}, seq_recipeReply.nextval, #{seq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_recipereply where rno = #{rno, jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from tbl_recipereply where rrno = #{rrno, jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from tbl_recipereply where bno=#{bno, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by rrno desc, seq
